overview: Colt Briner is the Vice President and General Manager at Democrasoft. He graduated from Willamette University in 1999 with a degree in Business and Economics and jumped right in by starting his own company, Coltronix, which he grew and later sold in 2002. He has been with the company since 2003. He also volunteers his time as a director at the Virtual Country Foundation, a California based nonprofit exploring and developing ways to use technology to improve democratic participation in businesses and institutions. When not working, he enjoys creating artworks and volunteering for the community.

milestones.source_description: Collaborize Classroom Brings Innovation into the Classroom with a Free Online Learning Platform
